Summary: Object traveled @ slow speed, made u-turn into cloud cover, lost visual, no sound, w/in few minutes military fighter headed towards object direction
divs: sighting detailsi was in my backyard, with my dogs for their 'potty break',and checking the sky for possible signs of rain. i saw an object that caught my eye. at first glance, i figured it was a commercial airplane. i noticed it was traveling at a slow speed and there was no sound, and no apparent appendages (wings ect.)it was silver\grey in color. there was no light relection from the sun making it glow or shine. it was a typical disc-like shaped object, flat and long. no other aircraft were visible from my vantage point when i first spotted the anomoly. within a few minutes, a commercial plane did fly over, heading north making the usual noise one hears with all aircraft and i could distinguish that it was a southwest airlines plane,the colors, wings and tail were very visible. the other object then made a u-turn. the disc like object was traveling north in the western sky at a slower speed than the commercial aircraft and the u-turn was not abrupt, just a semi-sharp rounded turn, now heading in a southerly direction and disappearing into a cloud bank. after the sw airplane was out of sight, i could no longer hear the sw jet engines, but i should have heard some engine noise from whatever was still traveling in the clouds above. i tried to see if the object had emerged from the cloud cover, but was unable to re-locate it. within the next minute or two, a military aircraft leaving a long contrail, making considerable noise despite its height was headed extremely fast in the southerly direction i last witnessed the object moving in. i have excellent eye sight, and i could make out on the military plane its wings,and small size, comparable to a fighter-type plane. due to trees in my neighborhood, i lost sight of the object after it made the u-turn, even though i went to the front yard to try and get a better perspective. the sky was cloudless from my southerly vantage point in my front yard. i also quickly lost sight of the military plane when the contrail ended. the whole episode lasted approximately 5-8 minutes. i have not told anyone what i saw, inclusive of my room-mate, and my daughter, my two closest confidants. did anyone else in the dallas\metroplex area report anything similar? sincerely and honestly, lisa m.
trends: There have been 15 other sightings in Carrollton
There were no other sightings in Carrollton on or around July 25th 2012
